pos_prompt: Realistic, High-quality. In the study, a man sits at a table featuring a bottle of milk while delivering a product presentation.
neg_prompt: Two people, two persons, aerial view, overexposed, low quality, deformation, a poor composition, bad hands, bad teeth, bad eyes, bad limbs, distortion, blurring, text, subtitles, static, picture, black border.
chinese: 真实感，高品质。一个男人坐在一张摆放着一瓶牛奶的桌子前进行产品演示
